sys_properties_category.name: Skytap - Demo Sales
sys_properties_category.title:
Application Overview

Skytap is the leading provider of self-service application development environments in the cloud. Skytap Cloud gives developers a fast, easy, and secure way to create complex computing environments in the cloud, while collaborating with IT requirements. Customers can run complex enterprise applications unchanged in Skytap Cloud, collaborate securely with global teams, and gain unparalleled business productivity.

Configuration Steps

1) Download update sets, preview update sets and commit

2) Navigate to Credentials and update Skytap Cloud Information

3) Use Skytap premitives to connect Skytap cloud

4) Use refresh button to load Templates

5) Keep Skytap and ServiceNow in Sync

Settings
